authors.author: George C. Stebbins William T. Sleeper

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
"Ye must be born again;
Ye must be born again.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
I verily, verily say unto thee,
Ye must be born again."

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
A ruler once came
To Jesus by night
To ask Him the way

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Of salvation and light.
The Master made answer
In words true and plain,
"Ye must be born again."

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Ye children of men,
Attend to the word
So solemnly uttered
By Jesus, the Lord;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
And let not this message
To you be in vain,
"Ye must be born again."

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
O ye who would enter
That glorious rest,
And sing with the ransomed

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
The song of the blest,
The life everlasting
If ye would obtain,
"Ye must be born again."

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
A dear one in heaven
Thy heart yearns to see,
At the beautiful gate
May be watching for thee;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Then list to the note
Of this solemn refrain,
"Ye must be born again."
